creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: small loom carved with moths, dragons, owls, cats and flowers; four small \"pedals\" (only two are attached to loom); small blue and white weaving fragment threaded through loom
title: Small (Model?) Loom with Weaving Fragment
